nodes.text: Ubrikkian Transports was a major manufacturer of repulsorcraft, including sail barges, landspeeders, swoops, and hovervans. The company used its military expertise to develop the HAVr A9 Floating Fortress, a repulsorlift weapons platform. Commercially, Ubrikkian manufactured repulsorlift equipment for use in industrial and mining operations, and moved into security and personal defense. Ubrikkian was a contributing sponsor of the Corporate Sector Authority.

Because of their success with the floating fortress, Ubrikkian Transports were awarded the contract in designing the chassis for the Imperial-class repulsortank. The results were the 1-L, 1-M, and 1-H models.
